definition.name: Avatar
definition.description: A reusable avatar component that serves as the root container for displaying user avatars. Built on top of Radix UI's Avatar primitive, it provides a circular container for avatar images with consistent sizing and styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the avatar container

definition.visualLayout: A circular container with fixed dimensions (h-10 w-10) that clips its contents to a rounded shape. It maintains aspect ratio and handles overflow gracefully.

definition.name: AvatarImage
definition.description: The image component of the Avatar system. It handles the display of the actual avatar image while maintaining proper aspect ratio and filling the container appropriately.

src.description: The source URL of the avatar image

alt.description: Alternative text for the avatar image

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the image

definition.visualLayout: A square image that fills its container while maintaining a 1:1 aspect ratio

definition.name: AvatarFallback
definition.description: A fallback component that displays when the avatar image fails to load or is not provided. It provides a centered container for displaying alternative content such as user initials or a placeholder icon.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the fallback container

children.description: The content to display in the fallback (typically user initials or an icon)

definition.visualLayout: A centered container that fills the avatar space with a muted background color, typically displaying text or an icon in the center
